title: 114_hr4871
content: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Boundary Adjustment Study Act This bill directs the Department of the Interior to conduct a special resource study of the lands, waters, and interests of the coastline and specified areas adjacent to the Santa Monica Bay in California to evaluate a range of alternatives for protecting the study area's resources, including: expanding and redesignating the Santa Monica Mountains Recreation Area as the quot, Santa Monica Mountains and Coastal Recreation Area,quot. Or creating a new coastal recreation area designated as the quot, Los Angeles Coastal Recreation Area. quot,
